name: bob marley ( father of reggae)
description:
Bob Marley married Rita Marley in February 1966. And it was Rita who introduced Bob to Rastafarianism. In 1969, Bob, Tosh and Livingston fully embraced Rastafarians, who greatly influenced music and reggae in general. happy last four years.

Bob Marley started his career with the Wailers, the group he formed with Peter Tosh and Bunny Livingston in 1963.

The Wailers collaborated with Lee Scratch Perry, producing hit hits such as Soul Rebel, Duppy Conquerer, 400 Years and Small Axe. The collaboration ended bitterly as Perry sold it in England without the Wailers' approval. But the event bore fruit, Chris Blackwell, owner of Island Records, signed the Wailers and produced their albums CATCH A FIRE and BURNIN.

In 1976, Bob Marley moved to England. His creativity did not subside, EXODUS managed to perch on the British charts for 56 weeks. after this the next album, namely KAYA. succeeded in bringing regga music to the western world for the first time.
